description.narrative: 1. Enabling SMEs to gain pricing advantages: Poor infrastructure and inadequate market linkages are among the key factors that have constrained the growth of the SME sector in India. The Company's key offering enables SMEs in the manufacturing sector to procure raw materials / inputs in a transparent manner while benefiting from better pricing of such items due to demand aggregation. 2. Enabling SMEs gain access to affordable financing: Lack of adequate and timely access to finance by SMEs is another key challenge to an SME's growth. Financial institutions too have limited on ground presence / access to data needed to profile credit servicing capabilities of SMEs. The Company's online demand aggregation platform enables it to capture unique data points on SME customers which allow superior credit profiling that an external lender can comfortably rely on and provide attractive financing terms. 3. Increase in SMEs reached: The Company has more than 50,000+ registered SMEs on its platform. 2000+ SMEs have transacted on the platform so far. Post launch of GST in India, the Company will be able to operate pan India. As a result, the number of transacting SMEs is expected to grow more than 10x by CY21. 4. Increase in employment by enabling SMEs to grow: According to 2015 estimates of the Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises ("MSME"), Govt. of India, the MSME sector generates around 100 million jobs through over 46 million MSMEs across the country each year. The Company's mission is aligned towards improving the financial health of MSMEs which will in turn result in additional job creation.

In addition to giving buying power to SMEs, Power2SME provides access to finance by helping its customers obtain working capital financing, more efficiently and at better terms through its network of empaneled banks and Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs).
